title: Oil Steadies With OPEC+, Venezuela in Focus at Start of New Year
description: Oil steadied on the first trading day of 2026 after its biggest annual drop since 2020, as traders weighed an upcoming OPEC+ meeting and geopolitical concerns.
content: Oil steadied on the first trading day of 2026 after its biggest annual drop since 2020, as traders weighed an upcoming OPEC+ meeting and geopolitical concerns.
